summary: Just a simple mesh edit I made out of desire to have a much cooler looking ebony helmet (in my opinion)
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00][size=3][b]NOW INCLUDING NEW FANCY MALE VERSION WITH APPROPRIATELY SHAPED NECK![/b][/size][/color]

And so I've made hot files! Thanks a lot everyone for appreciating this mod so much, I never expected it to be received so well.

Review by Thyworm (Thanks mate)
[youtube]63qe4W_w_NI[/youtube]

Simple video by Slytra (Thanks a lot!)
[youtube]Lpf_22OZYaU[/youtube]
Not a lot to say here, Just a simple mesh edit I made while wanting to create a new character focused around leading a group of ebony-clad knights and having a unique helmet of her own.

Just install to your skyrim data folder as should be expected.

INCOMPATABILIES
Only one known so far is Improved Close Face Helmets, at least until I create a standalone version.

As for credits, simply list me in them if you wish to use this in a mod, otherwise have fun.
author: CalvinShark
